about_role.heading: Job Description
body: ***Please DO NOT apply for this position by submitting your profile on this BC Government Hiring Centre website. Applications must be made via the following directions below.***
Bring your passion for Indigenous engagement and relationship-building to serve democracy in British Columbia.
Join an innovative and recognized leader in electoral administration.
Indigenous Outreach Specialist ​​​​​​​*This position is restricted to Indigenous (First Nations, Métis, or Inuit) applicants*
Applicants internal to the BC Public Service - temporary appointment to Administrative Officer (AO) 21
Applicants external to the BC Public Service - hired under the Election Act – Project Officer $38.20 per hour (plus bi-weekly compensation allowance for health and welfare)
1 full time temporary position to March 31, 2027 (part-time options may be considered)
Victoria, BC (hybrid); other communities in BC may be considered for remote work
Posting close date: 11/25/2025 at 11:00 pm Pacific Time
For complete details on this opportunity, and to apply, please review the job posting on the Elections BC website at www.elections.bc.ca/jobs.

application_instructions.heading: Application instructions

notes: DO NOT SUBMIT your application through this Recruitment System.

In order to apply on this competition, you must follow application instructions on the Elections BC website at www.elections.bc.ca/jobs. Applications submitted through this Recruitment System will NOT be accepted.

application_instructions.deadline_note: Applications will be accepted until 11:00pm Pacific Time on the closing date of the competition.
